about_the_game:
is the first survival horror game to feature speech interaction with AI. The game features elements of action, melee combat, survival, shooting, and puzzles that ask the player to use strategy and logical thinking. Taking place in 1977 in the Paul Staderbeiger Psychiatric Hospital, the plot revolves around Henry, his struggle with the ghosts of the past, and the pain of his loss and grief. Prepare for a journey beyond your imagining!



Voice-Interaction AI ● Close Combat and Armed Combat ● Puzzle-Solving ● Inventory





A revolutionary tool for gamer immersion

● IMMERSIVE AUDIO INPUT: A sound mechanic making you feel present in the game.

● BIO-FEEDBACK: More than just voice commands, the game listens to you: your screams, your words, and even your breathing.

● WHISPERS & SCREAMS: You will have to speak in a whisper, scream to scare characters away - and at some points you actually have to hold your breath to hide or escape!

● CHARACTER HEADSPACE: Playing the game will bring the player into the mind of Henry Gray, the main character - you feel his world around you!!





An unstable and gruesome atmosphere permeates the experience

● GRISLY SETTINGS: Make your way through horrific imagery including a defunct asylum, the cemetery where your family lies, a cannibal’s dining hall, and a cruel laboratory.

● CRYPTIC FORCES: A mysterious figure communicates with notes you find in the game - are they helping you or performing an experiment?

● CHILLING UNCERTAINTY: Pursued by monsters and guards, you have no idea what is real - constantly question your unreliable senses in this surreal horror environment.

● DARK ATMOSPHERE: The game is grimy, and dark. There is a strangeness throughout, of nightmarish sensations and occult symbolism.





● MIND-BENDING HORROR ATMOSPHERE: Become immersed in a dark deadly world full of heart pounding ambiance, photo-realistic environments, special effects, occult undertones and murderous enemies.

● OVERARCHING MYSTERY: Experience a dark twisted story as you unravel a terrifying mystery as Henry Gray, struggling with personal demons in a horror-filled world where nightmares have come to life.

●VOICE INTERACTION AI: Cutting edge audio A.I. technology that takes the experience to new heights. Enemies that can hear not only your voice, but can monitor breathing and react dynamically.

● PUZZLES: Explore and gather clues within the environment and from NPC’s, solve mysteries and unlock environmental puzzles that will require more brains than brawn.

● HAND CRAFTED LEVEL DESIGN: Experience masterfully crafted level design, providing immersive pacing, stunning visuals and twists and turns in epic gory fashion.





● The game's voice interaction during gameplay

● Break through the door with your scream-Rage.





● The game's voice interaction during gameplay

● Underwater, it's best to keep your mouth closed and hold your breath.



Attention!

Before starting the game, we ask you to properly adjust the sensitivity of your microphone.

(Correct setting will make the voice interaction in the game better)

Make a sound and watch the scale. The level of your voice should go above the white bar. If it doesn't, use the microphone sensitivity adjustment to fix it.

(You can always adjust the microphone sensitivity by going to settings and the audio section)

content_descriptors.notes:
ATTENTION:
The game contains scenes of cruelty and violence, scenes of a sexual nature, alcohol abuse, and murder. Video games can cause psychological distress in people. Caution is advised.

name: FIRE AND ASHES

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 (3.2 GHz) / AMD A8-7600 (3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Attention! A microphone and headphones are required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 (3.2 GHz) / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Attention! A microphone and headphones are required to play.

short_description: FIRE AND ASHES is an action/survival horror game with elements of the occult and a deep, paranoid uncertainty, The game has a ground-breaking voice interaction mechanic and the fidelity of Unreal Engine 5 immerses players in a realistic and terrifying experience.
